name: logos-notes-sync
title: Logos Notes Sync
description: Sync notes and highlights from Logos Bible Software to Obsidian
author: herman_bavinck

preferences.name: obsidianVaultPath
preferences.title: Obsidian Vault Path
preferences.description: Path to your Obsidian vault's Logos folder

preferences.name: excludedResources
preferences.title: Excluded Resources
preferences.description: Comma-separated list of resource IDs to exclude (e.g., LLS:ESV,LLS:NIV)

preferences.name: readwiseToken
preferences.title: Readwise Access Token
preferences.description: Your Readwise access token (get it from readwise.io/access_token). Leave empty to disable Readwise sync.

preferences.name: syncToReadwise
preferences.title: Sync to Readwise
preferences.description: Send highlights to Readwise in addition to Obsidian
preferences.label: Enable Readwise sync

preferences.name: autoSyncEnabled
preferences.title: Auto-Sync Daily
preferences.description: Automatically sync highlights once per day in the background
preferences.label: Enable daily auto-sync

commands.name: sync-notes
commands.title: Sync Notes
commands.subtitle: Logos
commands.description: Sync all notes and highlights from Logos to Obsidian
